title: Delete resource offering property
content:
For more information about resource offerings, see Resource offerings for sequenced designs.

To delete a property of a resource offering, in the resource offering's summary page, click the Properties tab. Click the gear icon for that property and choose Delete and confirm your choice.

For descriptions of certain properties, see Create a resource offering.

Related topics

  • To know different ways of using resource offerings, see Resource offerings for sequenced designs
  • Create a resource offering
